== Introduction ==
This is the ''Supported Applications'' section of the <nowiki>[[Applications|Applications Guide]]</nowiki>. Use the links on the navigation menu to the left to find references and links to all the applications available for Ubuntu 8.04 from the <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu.com/community/ubuntustory/components|Main]]</nowiki> <nowiki>[[Repositories|repository]]</nowiki>. All the applications are supported by <nowiki>[[http://www.canonical.com/|Canonical]]</nowiki> (the commercial backer of Ubuntu). For applications already installed by default see the <nowiki>[[SoftwareRepoDefault|Default Application Guide]]</nowiki> and the <nowiki>[[http://help.ubuntu.com|official Ubuntu 8.04 documentation]]</nowiki>.

== Additional software and help ==
The easiest way to browse and install additional software tools is through the <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/8.04/add-applications/C/gnome-app-install.html|Add/Remove...]]</nowiki> tool, which is found in the main <nowiki>[[Applications]]</nowiki> menu. After starting <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/8.04/add-applications/C/gnome-app-install.html|Add/Remove...]]</nowiki>, simply select a section from the list to the left hand column. For more general information on installing software, see <nowiki>[[InstallingSoftware]]</nowiki>. For more general help go to 'System > Help and Support' or visit the <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/8.04/|Official Documentation for Ubuntu 8.04 LTS]]</nowiki>.
